deleteProductFromDatabase

public static boolean deleteProductFromDatabase(Product p)
Changes the visibility to false, so the product should not be shown anymore, but will exist in existing orders. Returns true if the product was deleted, else it's false.

Parameters:
p -
Returns:
boolean True if the product was deleted, else it's false.

public static boolean updateProduct(Product p,
                                    java.lang.String name,
                                    double price,
                                    java.lang.String comment)
Updates a product p in the database with the given parameters. Returns true if the product was updated successfully. If false something wrong happened, and it wasn't updated.
